categories: Category:Star Wars: Fate of the Jedi

nodes.text: Fate of the Jedi: Conviction (American Printing House for the Blind audiobook)

Fate of the Jedi: Conviction is the unabridged audio version of the Legends novel of the same name, by author Aaron Allston. The audiobook was performed by Alec Volz and was released by American Printing House for the Blind in 2012.
